message: Let's get this done early, Bob. 70/30 split seems fair.
Your offer was a bit aggressive, Alice. Let's meet in the middle - how about a 60/40 split?
I understand you want a more even split, Bob, but time is money. 65/35 is my final offer.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice.  I'm offering a 55/45 split. Take it or leave it - but the pot gets smaller every round!
